pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:1.1: Venerables, these seven principles for the settling of legal issues come up for recitation.
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:1.2: “For the settling and resolving of legal issues whenever they arise there is:
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:1.4: Resolution through recollection to be granted;
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:1.5: Resolution because of past insanity to be granted;
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:1.6: Acting according to what has been admitted;
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:1.9: Covering over, as if with grass.
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:3.1: Venerables, the seven principles for the settling of legal issues have been recited.
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:3.2: In regard to this I ask you,
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:3.8: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:4.1: The seven principles for the settling of legal issues are finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:5.2: the eight rules on expulsion have been recited;
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:5.3: the seventeen rules on suspension have been recited;
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:5.4: the thirty rules on relinquishment and confession have been recited;
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:5.5: the one hundred and sixty-six rules on confession have been recited;
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:5.6: the eight rules on acknowledgment have been recited;
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:5.7: the rules to be trained in have been recited;
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:5.8: the seven principles for the settling of legal issues have been recited.
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:5.9: This much has come down and is included in the Monastic Code of the Master and comes up for recitation every half-month.
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:5.10: In regard to this everyone should train in unity, in concord, without dispute.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-as1-7:7.1: The Canonical Text on offenses entailing confession is finished.
